contents: Article 38 (Host Broadcasting Company) ① The Sports Council may select a hosting broadcaster with certain rights and obligations regarding the overall event, including the right to broadcast the general sports competition and the opening and closing ceremonies. ② The host broadcaster targets terrestrial broadcasting operators, general cable broadcasting operators, and broadcasting channel users. Revised on February 11, 2020. ③ The selection of the host broadcaster and the rights and obligations of the host broadcaster are governed by a separate agreement. ④ The organizing committee must actively cooperate with the Sports Council’s decisions regarding the selection and operation of the host broadcaster.
